subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in mobile-app (us-west-2)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in mobile-app (us-west-2)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The mobile application in the us-west-2 region is encountering critical page load errors due to security restrictions related to cross-origin resource sharing (CORS). This issue is causing blocked frames during page load, significantly impacting user experience and functionality. Users are experiencing delayed page loads (average load time of 7488.48 ms) and errors, leading to potential frustration and abandonment of the app. The issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: mobile-app
Region: us-west-2
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 7488.48,
  "bundle_size_kb": 313.47,
  "resources_loaded": 45
}

Workaround: Investigate CORS policies to ensure that all necessary origins are allowed. Review recent changes to the mobile-app that may have introduced these security errors.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to bug classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P0 priority. Escalated due to P0 critical priority.
